Great tacos at a reasonable price.  Flan was a little heavy but still good, probably would have been better if I got there when it was fresh.  If you’re looking for that spicy kick then get the green sauce.

Amazing tacos el pastor, best tacos I've ever had in my life flavor explosion!! will be coming back for sure!!! Person with me got a beef burrito and it was huge and delicious to if you want some good authentic Mexican this is the place to go 😍😍

Taco El Sol has been a weekly stop for us for years.  However, the last few visits the place, never spotless, has been grimy.  There is no attempt to wash the tables between customers and no attempt to keep the floor somewhat presentable during the day.  Our last visit there were few customers but every table was dirty.  Customers usually bus the tables themselves so all they need to do is come out and wash the tables.  The food is still good, but hard to enjoy in these surroundings.   My husband has ceased to order the steak burrito, because it has turned into a bean and steak burrito.  Half of his last steak burrito was all beans.  Something has changed this past year.

name: Field of Greens
address: 909 S Kansas Ave, Topeka, KS 66612, USA
reviews: Great option for a healthy lunch. Full salad bar, 2 soup options, and baked potatoes. They also make sandwiches to order.
Love this place!!! Tuesdays are state employee discount days too.
Good place, fresh salad, good selection, and friendly staff. Can’t ask for anything else than that!

Best place in Topeka for salad bar and soups for lunch on weekdays. Great place for health food. The staff are always friendly and personable. Love that it is locally owned. A must go place if you are anywhere near downtown Topeka.

This place is not worth the $30 for 2 people.
Salad wasn't fresh, very little in the containers.
The chicken noodle soup was barely Luke warm at best and not very tasty. 
Not the friendliest bunch. Closed the salad bar almost an hour before closing. 
We won't be back

name: Margarita's Jalisco North
address: 1835 NW Topeka Blvd ste 161-a, Topeka, KS 66608, USA
reviews: You want some excellent Mexican food? Look no farther! These guys are awesome! I'm really sorry that I waited so long to try them. The food and service were great, and they are rocking the take out too. My only complaints are that I wish the portions were a little bigger and that they are a little expensive, for what you get, but darn good! Give 'em a try! Oh, and for something different, try the fried cheesecake. Mmmm me likey!

Never been here before. Went and had pan fried tacos— amazing. The service was THE BEST Jorge was our waiter and his smile and fun attitude made for a great dinner with friends. Will be going back for sure!

Best Mexican Food in Topeka, KS 👏🏼 PERIOD! The food is so fresh. Jorge’s cheese dip has so much flavor! The chips and salsa are fire 🔥! I tried the Gringo Quesadilla, I would highly recommend. Clean environment, cold margaritas, and friendly staff. Anytime I want Mexican food in Topeka, Margarita Jalisco (NORTH) will receive my business every time. Only restaurant that reminds me of home, California! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

One of the best Mexican place I have been to. Great food, very good portion, and I inexpensive price. Their michelada was great. Even though the one come with shrimp cost $13, it still worth all the money. Great atmosphere, great food, great service, all around I would absolutely recommend it to anyone.
Love Taco Tuesday. Its hit and miss on the service sometimes. The chicken tacos are delicious and for $.99, amazing!

name: NOTO Burrito
address: 822 N Kansas Ave, Topeka, KS 66608, USA
reviews: One of the few local restaurants on Happy Cow in Topeka offering vegan food. We made the drive over to an empty-artsy area of town. Food was alright. We got the V burrito, the only vegan item on the menu. The sweet salsa they offer tasted like a strawberry smoothie and was a bit weird.

Great place, comfy/accepting environment with great burrito choice (the cilantro lime rice is the best!)

Food comes up fairly quick and I haven't had anything I didn't like 😁

Love it, the decor it unique, fitting well into the NOTO atmosphere🎆. Food was good, enjoyed the fact that I could have a beer with my lunch.

Divine timing, while we were in NOTO Burrito, WIBW was filming a segment of 'Fork in the Road'. it will air 3/10/20 @ 5pm
Very tasty food and great portions, especially for the price. The workers were really friendly and the food was served very quickly.
BEST burritos I've ever had. This is my official burrito spot. Great service. Great food

name: Pancho's
address: 3506 SW Topeka Blvd, Topeka, KS 66611, USA
reviews: This is my go to place whether it's lunch time or 4 am after a night of fun. It is open 24/7 and it is consistently great food. Staff is quite patient and always in a good mood. I highly recommend their burrito line up and pickled carrots.
Service was great! And food came pretty quickly. Very good tasting food. A must try for sure 😄

I love this place and eat there at least once a week. My favorite is the chorizo breakfast burrito, so good! Love the nachos with steak too! Prices are good for me though I know some folks might think they are a bit high but you get what you pay for and for the price Panchos is fresh and tasty! ❤️

Excellent food!  Best in Topeka!  We couldn't decide what to order.  It took us forever but the staff was patient.  She described each thing we asked about on the menu until we were satisfied w/our choice.  We were very pleased w/the food. We've been back several times. I dream about their food! You get tons of food also.  More than enough for one meal!
Absolutely Loved the Carna Asada Taco's!!! Definitely worth checking out for dinner... will definitely be back if I am in the neighborhood again!!!
